official_title: A bill to modify the project authorizing replacement of locks and dam 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois, and Missouri, to authorize construction of a second lock.

summary.text: Modifies the project authorizing the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to replace a certain dam and locks on the Mississippi River, Illinois and Missouri. Authorizes the Secretary to replace, at Federal expense, the terrestrial wildlife habitat inundated as a result of such construction project.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project authorizing replacement of locks and dam 26, Mississippi River, Alton, Illinois, and Missouri, to authorize construction of a second lock.
